labana wasare shri lankawe di pawathwena loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliyen shri lanka krikat aayathanayata rupiyal miliyana 3300ka pamana ruju aadayamak himiwe.shri lankawe di loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye tharaga 12k pawathwena athara tharaga 8kata amarikanu dolar laksha 60 k (ek tharagayakata a. do. 75000 bagin) labena athara tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwima wenuwen amarikanu dolar miliyanayak labe.loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye siyalu wiyadam kapa harimen pasuwa ithiriwana mudalin siyayata haththa pahak samajika ratawal dahayak athara bedimata jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaya ekanga wi atha.
